3mtt_program.overview: 3MTT (3 Million Technical Talent) is Nigeria's flagship skills development program aimed at building technical talent across the country.
3mtt_program.duration: The program runs for 12 months with different phases
3mtt_program.training_format: Hybrid - combines online learning through Darey.io platform with in-person sessions

courses.course_change_policy: Course changes are allowed before admission to the Learning Management System (LMS). Once admitted to LMS, course changes are not permitted.
courses.location_change_policy: Location changes are allowed at any time during Cohort 3.

platform.dashboard_sync: Dashboard scores sync gradually with Darey.io. There may be delays in score synchronization.
platform.portal_access: 3MTT portal provides access to community information, learning resources, and progress tracking

entry_assessment.purpose: Determines skill benchmark and helps select the most suitable course for fellows

assessments.ongoing_assessments: Regular assessments throughout the program to track progress

support.financial_support: Program covers training costs only. Participants are responsible for transportation, meals, and other personal expenses.
support.learning_communities: Fellows are assigned to location-based learning communities for peer collaboration and meetups

onboarding.waiting_period: During onboarding wait, fellows get access to free resources, collaborative self-paced learning, and information about physical meetups
onboarding.community_assignment: Community information appears on the community page within the 3MTT portal after assignment

technical_requirements.internet_access: Stable internet connection required for online components
technical_requirements.software_tools: Specific tools vary by track and will be communicated during onboarding

common_issues.dashboard_sync: Dashboard scores may take time to sync with Darey.io platform. This is normal and scores will update automatically.
common_issues.community_access: Community information becomes available on your portal dashboard once you're assigned to a learning community.
common_issues.course_selection: Carefully consider your course choice as changes are only allowed before LMS admission.
